name: Counter Clock Case
storyline:
Enter the shadowy streets of mid-1900s Europe as a vengeful protagonist, only to find your nemesis slain by another's hand.
Framed for a crime you didn't commit, unravel the mystery of your enemy's demise while navigating a web of deceit and betrayal.
summary: Embark on a quest for revenge in a city where your nemesis is already slain. Framed for murder, solve looping cases with a unique twist. Explore, interrogate, and customize your character in this TRPG-style narrative with multiple endings. Unearth conspiracies in this captivating adventure.
